name: Leap of Fright (Browser)
description:
Posted only the browser version here since I couldn't upload this version to the jam(BTP Jam 3) in time. Original page is https://glas.itch.io/leap-of-fright

Guide Brave Bunny through the Fearsome Forest. Keep their sanity up or suffer the consequences! 

Controls (also stated in the game)

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move and Jump

L - Lessen Vision                R - Go back to Checkpoint

*Doing lots of things at once overwhelm Brave Bunny. For your guidance, their inner thoughts are displayed at the top center of the screen.
